channel.title: South African National Blood Service | SANBS
channel.description:
SANBS provides an essential service within South Africa and is rated amongst the best in the world in the provision of blood and blood products, as well as in relation to the research and training provided.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard

item.author: sanbs@solidgoldstudios.co.za (SANBS | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: SANBS | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Covid-19 | Dr. Pheello Lethola (lead consultant for donor services | SANBS)
item.itunes:title: Covid-19 | Dr. Pheello Lethola (lead consultant for donor services | SANBS)
item.itunes:subtitle: What you need to know about Covid-19 and blood
item.description:
With so many places now closed where SANBS usually collects donations, and some of the common misinformation people have, this conversation answers your key questions on safety during the Covid-19 pandemic.

Music : https://JohnBartmann.com


Visit the SANBS website https://sanbs.org.za

Follow on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/sanbs

Follow on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/thesanbs/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.content:encoded:
With so many places now closed where SANBS usually collects donations, and some of the common misinformation people have, this conversation answers your key questions on safety during the Covid-19 pandemic.
